discs.descriptionEN: Deals a projectile damage (High) + knocks back
discs.descriptionJP: 前方範囲に大ダメージ攻撃 + ＋吹き飛ばし

discs.descriptionEN: Deals a piercing damage (Medium) + shield-break
discs.descriptionJP: 前方に中ダメージの貫通突進攻撃＋シールドブレイク

discs.descriptionEN: Heals HP by 50% for all teammates
discs.descriptionJP: 味方全員のHPを50％回復

discs.descriptionEN: Regenerates user HP equal to 100% user max HP over 20 seconds
discs.descriptionJP: 自身のHPを20秒間継続回復 (最大100％)

discs.descriptionEN: Increases ATK (Medium) over 15 seconds for all teammates
discs.descriptionJP: 味方全員の攻撃力を15秒間中アップ

discs.descriptionEN: Deals an AoE damage (Extremely High)
discs.descriptionJP: 周囲球状に極大ダメージ攻撃

discs.descriptionEN: Deals an AoE damage (Medium) + paralyzes
discs.descriptionJP: 周囲球状に中ダメージ攻撃 + ＋シビレ

discs.descriptionEN: Deploys a shield that cuts off 70% incoming damage (Active Time: 10 Seconds)
discs.descriptionJP: 自身の被ダメージを10秒間70％カット

discs.descriptionEN: Fires multiple projectiles forwards (Total Damage = Extremely High)
discs.descriptionJP: 前方に連射攻撃(合計大ダメージ)

discs.descriptionEN: Boosts energy recovery speed (High) over 10 seconds for all teammates
discs.descriptionJP: 味方全員のブーストエネルギー回復量を10秒間大アップ

discs.descriptionEN: Warps to start point + heals user HP by 100%
discs.descriptionJP: スタート地点に瞬間移動し、HPを100％回復

discs.descriptionEN: Sets a turret that attacks an enemy within its range (Attack Speed = Fast, Active Time = 15 seconds)
discs.descriptionJP: 範囲内の相手を超高速で攻撃するタレットを15秒間設置

discs.descriptionEN: Creates an AoE field that deals damage consecutively (Total Damage = Extremely High, Field Active Time = 8 Seconds)
discs.descriptionJP: 連続ダメージを与える空間を8秒間生成(合計極大ダメージ)

discs.descriptionEN: Sets a bomb that is triggered when an enemy approaches it, deals damage (High) to enemies standing within the range + knocks them back (Active Time = 20 Seconds)
discs.descriptionJP: 大ダメージ＋吹き飛ばす爆弾を20秒間設置

discs.descriptionEN: Pushes an enemy along with user + deals damage (Low)
discs.descriptionJP: 前方に小ダメージの追撃突進攻撃

discs.descriptionEN: Deals a projectile damage (Medium) + knocks back
discs.descriptionJP: 前方範囲に中ダメージ攻撃 + ＋吹き飛ばし

discs.descriptionEN: Heals user HP by 60%
discs.descriptionJP: 自身のHPを60％回復

discs.descriptionEN: Deals damage (Medium) to the first enemy got hit + slows that enemy movement speed over 5 seconds
discs.descriptionJP: 前方1体に中ダメージ攻撃 + ＋5秒間移動速度中ダウン

discs.descriptionEN: Deals damage (Medium) to the first enemy got hit + paralyzes that enemy
discs.descriptionJP: 前方1体に中ダメージ攻撃 ＋シビレ

discs.descriptionEN: Deals damage (High) to enemies standing in front of user within the range + knocks them up
discs.descriptionJP: 近くの相手に大ダメージ攻撃 ＋上吹き飛ばし

discs.descriptionEN: Continuously rushs forwards with high speed over 5 seconds (direction is changeable, but stops when knocks into an object)
discs.descriptionJP: 自動的に5秒間高速前進する

discs.descriptionEN: Warps behind locked on target or the closet enemy
discs.descriptionJP: ロックオン相手、または最も近い相手の背後へ瞬間移動

discs.descriptionEN: Sets a turret that attacks an enemy within its range (Attack Speed = Slow, Active Time = 15 seconds)

discs.descriptionEN: Deal an AoE damage (Low) + deals poison damage equal to 60% enemy max HP over 20 seconds
